DOC.brief_summary: This study aim find whether diagnosis Transient Tachypnea Newborn ( TTN ) predict via evaluate pulmonary artery Doppler index .
DOC.brief_title: PATET Ratio Rule Out Transient Tachypnea Newborn
DOC.detailed_description: Transient Tachypnea Newborn ( TTN ) common diagnose disease state neonatal respiratory distress . However adequate method diagnose rule TTN . In several study pulmonary artery Doppler index investigate possible indicator pulmonary function . As result study , physiological process fetal lung maturation establish ; pulmonary tissue impedance resistance decrease increase gestational age , lead increase pulmonary blood flow . In normal lung maturation process peak sistolic velocity reach midsystole , case reason disturb nornal development process , peak occurs earlier . We suggest TTN , factor increase pulmonary tissue impedance like respiratory distress syndrome ( RDS ) pulmonary hypoplasia , would change pulmonary artery ( PA ) Doppler index , thus way evaluate pulmonary artery Doplerr index , could predict possible diagnosis TTN
DOC.criteria: Singleton pregnancy deliver beyond 34 week gestational age fetal abnormality , chronicle maternal disease , pregnancy complication ( preeclampsia , diabetes , intrauterine growth restriction , etc . )
